text.__SUMMARY__: Odostomia dijkhuizeni is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pyramidellidae, the pyrams and their allies.
text.Description: The size of the shell of this micromullusc varies between 2.3 mm and 2.5 mm.
text.Distribution: This species occurs in the Atlantic Ocean off Mauritania.
text.External links:
"Odostomia (Odostomia) dijkhuizeni". Gastropods.com. Retrieved 9 November 2011.
